name: Sacralice
description:
Sacralice is a puzzle game made during a game jam. (Ludum Dare 43)

It features 3 unique levels in which you will have to sacrifice one of your crew members to make progress in the game.

Controls :

-wasd or arrow keys = Move

-numbers or numpad = Change shape

-C = Sacrifice

-R = Quick Retry

The game was made with Game Maker Studio 2.
